current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide a categorical exclusion under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 to allow the
			 Director of the Bureau of Land Management and the Chief of the Forest
			 Service to remove Pinyon-Juniper trees to conserve and restore the habitat
			 of the greater sage-grouse.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Environment and Public Works

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Sage-Grouse Habitat Conservation and Restoration Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Sage-Grouse Habitat Conservation and Restoration Act of 2014
